TextView.android:text: Which arm, did the LW enrolled in?
LW ka indiraj kis arm ma howa
Number of days for which supply was given
Kitnay dinoun k sacchay diya LW ko
Number of sachet given
Kitnay sachet diya LW ko
Key messages
\n (Maamta sachet sa mutaliq ehaam maloomat)
1. Maamta product is balance protein and energy supplement for lactating women
1. Maamta sachet aik protein based balanced energy supplement ha jo khaas tor pay dhood pilanay wali maoun k liya ha
2. Before use, try to press sealed sachet slowly with your fingers to soften this paste
2. Istimaal sa pehaly sachet ko haath sa achi tarhan daba k andar mojoud paste ko naram kar lain
3. Taste of product is sweet in nature, but consider it as a special product only design for lactating women.
3. Andar mojoud paste ka zaiqa thora sa meetha ha, jo k sirf aur sirf dhoodh pilanay wali maoun k liya banaya gaya ha
4. After eating this product, you may have improved breast milk to feed your child.
4. Is ko khanay k baad, Maa k dhood ma izafa ho ga takay app apnay bachay ko acha dhood pila sakain
5. It will only benefit, when you consume 2 complete sachets in a day for next 6 months and exclusively breastfeed your child.
5. Is ka zayda faida tab ho ga jab app 2 sacchets 1 din ma musalsal 6 mahinay tak istimaal karain and saath ma bachay ko sirf aur sirf ma aka dhood pilain
6. Our team will provide you 14 days supply, which you have to consume according to instructions
6. Hamari team app ko 14 din k sachet faraham karay gee jo k app na di gay hidayaat k mutabiq istimal karna ha
7. Maamta product is designed only for lactating women, it may cause side effects if children and other adult member will use it.
7. Yeh product sirf aur sirf dhood pilanay wali maoun k liya banai gay ha, bachay ya kisi aur ko khilanay k surat ma koi bh muzir asraat ho saktay han
8. Do not share Maamta with anyone in the family, even in a small quantity
8. App ko jo sachet diya gaya ha us ko ghar ma kisi ko aur istimaal na karnay dain

9. You can eat Maamta directly from the sachet and save the remaining amount in a covered utensil or you may completely pour the sachet in a plate and eat it with spoon. Do not forget to cover the plate if amount is left over.

9. App Maamta sachet rookha bh kha sakti han, ya plate ma nikal k chamchay sa bh. Agar istimal k baad thori miqdar sacchay ma bach jay tu sachet ko bund kar k rakh lain ya phir plate ko dhak k rakhain
10. If you develop any type of rash, diarrhea, vomiting or any other unusual sign and symptoms, please immediately contact us
10. Agar maamta khanay k baad app ko kisi bh kisam ka masla ho maslan pait kharab, ulti, jisam pay laal nishan ana, tu foran hum sa rabta karain
11. Unused portion of Maamta sachet should be consumed within a day
11. Maamta sachay kholnay k baad aik din k andar andar istimaal kar laina chahiya, istimal k baad khali sachet ko sambhal k rakahin appnay pass
12. Save the empt y sachet in a bag provided to you AND remember that empty sachet will be collected by the team later
12. istimal k baad khali sachet ko sambhal k rakahin appnay pass aur Yaad rahay k khali sachet hamari team app sa jama karay gee tu un ko hifazat sa rakahin.
LW enrolled in Maamta + Azithromycin Arm (Arm C)
LW ka indiraj Arm C ma howa ha jis ma Maamta sachet aur Azithromycin doun di jain gee
LW is counselled about a dose of Azithromycin to a child at 42 days of age?
LW ko bata diya ha k bachay ko 42 din pay Azithromycin k aik khoorak di jay gee
